name: Paul is Dead
description:
Inspired by the enduring urban legend, you play as Willam Campbell, a talented musician and Paul McCartney look-a-like, discovered by the Beatles Manager and taken away from your friends and family, brought into a conspiracy and lifestyle that you can never leave.

The story begins three weeks after Paul's death.   You are recovering from plastic surgery and trying to perfect a Liverpool accent while working to make your left hand more dominant...
